name: Alien Forest Run Pro
description: Alien Forest Run is top action thrilling IOS game in running games category. Make the Alien safely run in the jungle with hurdles on the way. Moving through the Jungle the Alien life will face continuously growing danger as the level changes hence keeping the players interest. Jump up or down according to the situation to save the Alien from being crashed. Run run and keep running until you find the way to save the Alien.. Simply put, it is one of the most amusing Alien running game for kids and adults.
